2021-05-14.name: National Morel Mushroom Festival
2021-05-14.summary: This town on the east end of Lake Charlevoix is all about morels in May, with a guided mushroom hunt, a competition with prizes, drawings for free morels and The Taste of Morels, with morsels provided by local restaurants.

2021-05-15.name: National Morel Mushroom Festival

2021-05-15.name: Doors Open Minneapolis
2021-05-15.summary: Get a free, behind-the-scenes look at 115 historic theaters, hotels, courthouses and mansions as well as new buildings and venues, including Target Field, Surly Brewing, the Prospect Park water tower and the Pillsbury A Mill. On-site docents lead tours or answer questions.

2021-05-29.name: Fort Michilimackinac Pageant
2021-05-29.summary: This free pageant  at Colonial Michilimackinac features a cast of more than 400, re-enacting  events that took place between the French, British and Indian tribes on June 2, 1763.

2021-05-29.name: River Valley Festival
2021-05-29.summary: In this town north of Des Moines, normally there are walking tours of the Iowa Arboretum, guided hikes, a bags tourney, an art fair with music, a garage-art car show and a family ride on the High Trestle Trail.

2021-05-22.name: World War I Encampment
2021-05-22.summary: At Midway Village, more than 225 re-enactors portray soldiers and civilians from the United States and Europe and stage narrated battles.
